name: 2.5D Platformer (GarfGameDev)
description:
A little tech demo showcasing some key features involved in a 2.5D platformer.

The first ledge you can grab automatically and then press the "E" key to climb up from it.

Ladders can be climbed automatically and you can even do a dodge roll by pressing the "LShift" key.

The game will restart if you collect all 10 coins or run out of lives.
